tAppTagLine:
Learn To Code. 
Free For Everyone
tOnBoardingSubTitle1: Let's start your journey with us on this amazing and easy platform.
tOnBoardingSubTitle2: Get Video Tutorials of each topic to learn things easily.
tOnBoardingSubTitle3: Save time by just copy pasting complete apps you learned from videos.
tWelcomeSubTitle: Let's put your creativity on the development highway.
tLoginSubTitle: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
tSignUpSubTitle: Create your profile to start your Journey.
tForgetPasswordSubTitle: Select one of the options given below to reset your password.
tForgetPhoneSubTitle: Enter your registered Phone No to receive OTP
tForgetMailSubTitle: Enter your registered E-Mail to receive OTP
